name: Steven_Spielberg
text:
Steven Spielberg
Steven Spielberg was the director of the 1977 film Close Encounters of the Third Kind.
Behind the scenes
Steven Spielberg is an American film director, producer, and screenwriter. Considered one of the most popular directors in film history, he is known for films such as Jaws, Close Encounters of the Third Kind, Raiders of the Lost Ark, and Schindler's List.
A fan of Twin Peaks, Spielberg expressed interest in directing "Episode 8" but this never came to fruition.
